actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 213 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that certain expenses of child adoption shall be treated as medical expenses.

summary.text: Provides that the reasonable and necessary expenses of child adoption shall be treated as medical expenses for purposes of deductibility under the Internal Revenue Code.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 213 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that certain expenses of child adoption shall be treated as medical expenses.
